snippet: The Riverside Symphony, conducted by George Rothman, opened its new season at Alice Tully Hall on Saturday night with the pianist Hélène Tysman.
abstract: David Allen reviews performance by Riverside Symphony, featuring pianist Helene Tysman, at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Riverside Symphony, conducted by George Rothman, opened its new season at Alice Tully Hall on Saturday night with the pianist Hélène Tysman.

headline.seo: Riverside Symphony Opens Season at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: An Eclectic Evening to Start a Season
headline.print_headline: An Eclectic Evening to Start a Season
